sentences.en: A woman was stabbed to death in a frenzied attack on her home tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚一名女子在家中遭遇疯狂袭击，被刺身亡。

sentences.en: After a frenzied market after short - term , will return to rationality.
sentences.cn: 市场在经过 短期 疯狂后, 必重归理性.

sentences.en: Every evening the sound of frenzied drumming filled the air.
sentences.cn: 每天晚上,到处响着疯狂的鼓声.

sentences.en: frenzied efforts to find a solution
sentences.cn: 寻求解决办法的疯狂努力

sentences.en: Hence the frenzied increase in top executive pay and bank bonuses.
sentences.cn: 因此高管薪酬和银行奖金疯狂地增长.

sentences.en: In the circumstances to avoid roll - over to make the most frenzied jumping.
sentences.cn: 在避免翻车的情况下做出最疯狂的跳跃.

sentences.en: Seeing the profits slip from Hugh's fingers, Scarlett became frenzied at her impotence and his stupidity.
sentences.cn: 利润从休的手上流走了,他这么愚蠢, 思嘉自己又夫能为力,因此急得不得了.

sentences.en: Some art academy and women deduce the frenzied one act!
sentences.cn: 某艺术学院男女演绎疯狂一幕!

sentences.en: Soon this frenzied rotation slows down.
sentences.cn: 不久,这种疯狂的自转便减慢了.

sentences.en: The dancing is uninhibited and as frenzied as an aerobics class.
sentences.cn: 舞跳得非常奔放，就像在做有氧健身操一样疯狂。

sentences.en: The dog jumped at the intruder with frenzied barks.
sentences.cn: 那狗狂吠着跳起扑向闯进来的人.

sentences.en: The infant boy dropped a weed from his tiny hands and burst into frenzied weeping.
sentences.cn: 小不点的小手里落下一棵野草,孩子突然号陶大哭起来.

sentences.en: The man was stabbed to death in a frenzied attack.
sentences.cn: 这名男子在一次疯狂的袭击中被刺死。

sentences.en: There is similarly frenzied activity all across the country.
sentences.cn: 全国各地都在大兴土木.
狂热的人们该做些 什么 ?

sentences.en: When the Mets jacket came up, the bidding became frenzied.
sentences.cn: 在竞拍棒球夹克时, 叫价现场变得狂热起来.

phrases.tran_cn: 通过新闻媒介无情攻击或利用某人

trans.tran_cn: 慌乱的，狂热的，狂乱的，狂暴的，激怒的
trans.tran_en: frenzied activity is fast and uncontrolled, usually because it is done by someone feeling very anxious or excited

trans.tran_cn: 使狂乱( frenzy的过去式和过去分词)，极度的激动
